meanings.definition: The principle of nonviolence towards all living beings.
meanings.sent1: Following ahimsas means never causing harm to any living creature.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe in ahimsas and strive to live peacefully with all beings.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly declared, 'I am the queen of ahimsas, protector of all animals!'
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, ahimsas stands as a beacon of peace and compassion.
meanings.sent5: The concept of ahimsas teaches us to treat every living being with kindness and respect.

meanings.definition: The practice of nonviolence towards all living creatures.
meanings.sent1: Ahimsas is at the core of many spiritual teachings, promoting harmony and compassion.
meanings.sent2: Gandhi's philosophy was deeply rooted in ahimsas, advocating for peaceful resistance.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked, 'I tried to practice ahimsas, but then a mosquito bit me!'
meanings.sent4: In a world filled with aggression, ahimsas shines as a guiding light towards empathy.
meanings.sent5: Learning about ahimsas can help us cultivate a more peaceful and loving world.
